price: Waggoota muraasa keessatti (moo’atu). ajajni duraas ta’ee boodaa kan Rabbiiti. Guyyaa san mu’uminoonni ni gammadu.
arabic: فِي بِضۡعِ سِنِينَۗ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَمِنۢ بَعۡدُۚ وَيَوۡمَئِذٖ يَفۡرَحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fī biḍ'ʿi sinīna lillahi al-amru min qablu wamin baʿdu wayawma-idhin yafraḥu al-mu'minūna
